changeCurrPlayer() - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.gc07.controller.GameController
Method that change the current player, if it's the last turn and all the players played the same amount of turn it computes the winner; if a player is disconnect from the game he loses the turn, if a player is stalled he will be skipped.
